chapter.title: Planned features
chapter.subtitle: A very rough roadmap of ADG features implementation
chapter.para: The following list is roughly in implementation order. All the improvements must be reflected in the demo programs, where applicable.

itemizedlist.listitem: Implement a basic AdgXatchStyle, derived from AdgLineStyle.
Check if the flag management in AdgEntity is implemented properly.
Try to avoid wrapping of cairo APIs in AdgPath.
Optimize the implemented entities applying the 0.3 ADG infractrusture and enable caching where applicable.
Add a "beyond" property to AdgDim, to be used in extending the baseline on outside arrows requested. If not specified, it must default to 3 x arrow size.
Add a three-state enum to adg-enums.h: ADG_THREE_STATE_OFF, ADG_THREE_STATE_ON and ADG_THREE_STATE_DEFAULT.

Add the three-state "outside" property to allow forcing an outside quote. In the default state, the outside must be decided by the space between the extension lines: if greather than 3 x arrow size => inside arrows.
Implement the outside arrows in AdgLDim.
Change building scripts to get the Gtk+ dependency optional.
Add AdgLayout, a GtkLayout derived class that could accept an AdgCanvas.
Add AdgTitleBlock, a complex entity in paper space used to frame the sheet and show the general drawing data (title, scale, date and so on).
Implement AdgModel and the model-view interaction.
Implement AdgText, a generic text management, using pango.
